data.name: Lucky Bums Kids Plastic Snowboard
description: Beginner snowboard is great choice for kids to snowboarding in backyard or on nearby sledding hill
Smooth bottom board with traditional snowboard cut
Rugged design includes pre-mounted adjustable bindings that accommodate snow boots; durable latch system ensures secure fit
Recommended for riders age nine and up; since it does not include metal edges, snowboard not recommended for ski resort use
Limited lifetime manufacturer's warranty against defects in materials and workmanship

customerReviews.title: Go for it
customerReviews.comment: I picked this up for my girlfriends 8 year old son who was asking for a snowboard but, he had never used one so I didn't want to spend a fortune for what might not be used much. The board arrived fast and it was actually a pretty good board. Granted, as some of the other reviews mentioned, this is a plastic board and so the edges aren't that sharp but, we're not using it on a ski slope. We have a nice area near our house that has hills about 25 feet high so, this was perfect. The board was sturdy, it allowed him to attach to and get out of the bindings easily and most of all, he loved it and he ended up being pretty impressive on it. For fifty dollars, this was great buy for a beginning boarder.

customerReviews.title: My Two Boys are Lucky Bums
customerReviews.comment: We got 2 Snowboards for our boys for Christmas. What a Hit!! The stickers didn't fair so well. But the boards are Great!

customerReviews.title: Good starter
customerReviews.comment: this has been a good starter for my 4yr old. gets him used to balancing while riding. the plastic is not very slick so speed is an issue. waxing the bottom with car wax has helped. keep in mind it is plastic and this is truley the first step to see if your child wants to deal with the pains of snowboarding.i would buy again
